channel.title: Choices for npcdialogue don't show up?
channel.description: for example.. case 5: choice("Why? What's the matter?", "Tough luck buddy."); It'll just skip right over this and go onto case 6: Or onto the next "talk" or "talk2"

item.title: Choices for npcdialogue don't show up?
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

there might be to things why it does like that.
In the client.java:

if(NPCID == 209){ NpcDialogue = 130;//<-- this, you might did it this number wrong. NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Or you did something wrong with talk cases.
Sometimes they skip them because “talk” is wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: Choices for npcdialogue don't show up?

item.title: Choices for npcdialogue don't show up?
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

for example…
case 5:
choice(“Why? What’s the matter?”, “Tough luck buddy.”);
It’ll just skip right over this and go onto case 6: Or onto the next “talk” or “talk2”

Read full topic
item.source: Choices for npcdialogue don't show up?
